00006         class TranslatePointElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00007         {
00008                 private:
00009                         ElementID mElement;
00010                         const PipelineElement1D *mElementPtr;
00011                         Real mTranslationX;
00012 
00013                 public:
00014                         TranslatePointElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, ElementID element, Real TranslationX) :
00015                                 mElement(element), mTranslationX(TranslationX)
00016                         {
00017                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00018                         }
00019                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00020                         {
00021                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x+mTranslationX, cache);
00022                         }
00023 
00024         };
00025 
00026         class TranslatePointElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00027         {
00028                 private:
00029                         ElementID mElement;
00030                         const PipelineElement2D *mElementPtr;
00031                         Real mTranslationX;
00032                         Real mTranslationY;
00033 
00034                 public:
00035                         TranslatePointElement2D (const Pipeline2D *pipe, ElementID element, Real TranslationX, Real TranslationY) :
00036                                 mElement(element), mTranslationX(TranslationX), mTranslationY(TranslationY)
00037                         {
00038                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00039                         }
00040                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00041                         {
00042                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x+mTranslationX, y+mTranslationY, cache);
00043                         }
00044 
00045         };

00047         class TranslatePointElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00048         {
00049                 private:
00050                         ElementID mElement;
00051                         const PipelineElement3D *mElementPtr;
00052                         Real mTranslationX;
00053                         Real mTranslationY;
00054                         Real mTranslationZ;
00055 
00056                 public:
00057                         TranslatePointElement3D (const Pipeline3D *pipe, ElementID element, Real TranslationX, Real TranslationY, Real TranslationZ) :
00058                                 mElement(element), mTranslationX(TranslationX), mTranslationY(TranslationY), mTranslationZ(TranslationZ)
00059                         {
00060                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00061                         }
00062                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00063                         {
00064                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x+mTranslationX, y+mTranslationY, z+mTranslationZ, cache);
00065                         }
00066

00072         class TranslatePointModule : public Module
00073         {
00074                 private:
00075                         Real mTranslationX;
00076                         Real mTranslationY;
00077                         Real mTranslationZ;
00078 
00079                 public:
00081                         TranslatePointModule() : Module(1), mTranslationX(0.0), mTranslationY(0.0), mTranslationZ(0.0)
00082                         {
00083                         }
00085                         void setTranslationX (Real v)
00086                         {
00087                                 mTranslationX = v;
00088                         }
00090                         Real getTranslationX () const
00091                         {
00092                                 return mTranslationX;
00093                         }
00095                         void setTranslationY (Real v)
00096                         {
00097                                 mTranslationY = v;
00098                         }
00100                         Real getTranslationY () const
00101                         {
00102                                 return mTranslationY;
00103                         }
00105                         void setTranslationZ (Real v)
00106                         {
00107                                 mTranslationZ = v;
00108                         }
00110                         Real getTranslationZ () const
00111                         {
00112                                 return mTranslationZ;
00113                         }
00115                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00116                         {
00117                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00118                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00119                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new TranslatePointElement1D(pipe, first, mTranslationX));
00120                         }
00122                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00123                         {
00124                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00125                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00126                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new TranslatePointElement2D(pipe, first, mTranslationX, mTranslationY));
00127                         }
00129                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00130                         {
00131                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00132                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00133                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new TranslatePointElement3D(pipe, first, mTranslationX, mTranslationY, mTranslationZ));
00134                         }
00136                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_TRANSLATEPOINT; }
00137 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00139                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00141                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00142 #endif
00143         };
